trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties for writing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Définit des méthodes et des propriétés pour écrire une <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method in order to obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer for adding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser le <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> méthode afin d’obtenir un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> enregistreur pour ajouter <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> contenu à un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Ajoute un nouvel objet <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> au <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: A writer for outputting the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Writer permettant de restituer le nouveau <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple suivant illustre l'utilisation de la méthode <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The image type to write.
trans-unit.target: Type d'image à écrire.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Ajoute une image <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> pour le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Nouvelle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
trans-unit.target: Par exemple, le `imageType` peut être <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.

trans-unit.source: Only one thumbnail image can represent the document sequence as a whole (although individual documents and pages can have their own thumbnail images).
trans-unit.target: Seule une image miniature peut représenter la séquence de documents dans son ensemble (bien que les pages et des documents individuels peuvent avoir leurs propres images miniatures).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> is called when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> already has a thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> est levée si <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> est appelée lorsque le <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> a déjà une miniature.

trans-unit.source: Flushes and closes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> writer.
trans-unit.target: Vide et ferme le writer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A> method to flush and close the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser le <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A> méthode pour vider et fermer le <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer.

trans-unit.source: Sets a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: Définit un <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> pour la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> qui est écrite.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents a default printing configuration for the sequence.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> qui représente une configuration de l'impression par défaut pour la séquence.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Cette propriété ne pas valider ou modifier le texte spécifié <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> en tant <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Si nécessaire, utilisez le <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> méthode pour créer un <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-spécifiques <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> qui n’est valide pour l’imprimante spécifiée.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A> property to associate a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser le <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A> propriété à associer un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> avec la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] du <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />qui est écrit.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: Le [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> qui est écrit.
